article.title: Raytheon to Upgrade Tactical Control System Office
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Raytheon Company, Falls Church, Virginia, is being awarded a more than $6 million modification to a previously awarded contract to provide upgrades to the Tactical Control System Office of the Secretary of Defense architecture from version 1.0 to version 2.0.Â The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
